   20: 
   21: -module(trace_session_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   24: 
   25: -export([test_set_on_spawn/1,
   26:          test_set_on_first_spawn/1,
   27:          test_set_on_link/1,
   28:          test_set_on_first_link/1,
   29:          on_load/1,
   30:          trace_info_on_load/1,
   31:          procs/1,
   32:          basic/1,
   33:          call/1,
   34:          meta/1,
   35:          destroy/1,
   36:          end_of_list/1]).
   37: 
   38: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   39: 
   40: 
   41: -undef(line).
   42: -ifdef(debug).
   43: -define(line,io:format("line ~p\n",[?LINE]),erlang:display(?LINE)).
   44: -else.
   45: -define(line,void).
   46: -endif.
   47: 
   48: -export([foo/0, exported/1]).
   49: 
   50: suite() ->
   51:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   52:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   53: 
   54: all() ->
   55:     [
   56:      basic,
   57:      call,
   58:      meta,
   59:      on_load,
   60:      trace_info_on_load,
   61:      procs,
   62:      test_set_on_spawn,
   63:      test_set_on_first_spawn,
   64:      test_set_on_link,
   65:      test_set_on_first_link,
   66:      destroy,
   67:      end_of_list].
   68: 
   69: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   70:     Was = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
   71:     [{available_internal_state, Was} | Config].
   72: 
   73: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   74:     case proplists:get_value(available_internal_state, Config) of
   75:         false ->
   76:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false);
   77:         true ->
   78:             ignore
   79:     end.
   80: 
   81: erlang_trace(legacy, PidPortSpec, How, FlagList) ->
   82:     erlang:trace(PidPortSpec, How, FlagList);
   83: erlang_trace(Session, PidPortSpec, How, FlagList) ->
   84:     erlang:trace(Session, PidPortSpec, How, FlagList).
   85: 
   86: erlang_trace_pattern(legacy, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   87:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, MS, FlagList);
   88: erlang_trace_pattern(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   89:     erlang:trace_pattern(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList).
   90: 
   91: 
   92: on_load(_Config) ->
   93:     Tester= self(),
   94:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
   95:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
   96:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
   97:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create(session0, undefined, []),
   98:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
   99:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  100: 
  101:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  102:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  103:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  104: 
  105:     on_load1(S1, Tracer1),
  106:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  107:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  108:     on_load2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  109:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  110:     on_load2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  111:              legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  112: 
  113:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  114:              S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  115:     on_load2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  116:              S1, Tracer1, []),
  117: 
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: trace_info_on_load(_Config) ->
  121:     Tester = self(),
  122:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer", Tester) end),
  123:     S = erlang:trace_session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
  124:     1 = erlang:trace(S, self(), true, [call]),
  125:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(S, on_load, true, []),
  126:     {all,[{traced,global},
  127:       {match_spec,[]},
  128:       {meta,false},
  129:       {meta_match_spec,false},
  130:       {call_count,false}]} = erlang:trace_info(S, on_load, all),
  131:     ok.
  132: 
  133: on_load1(Session, Tracer) ->
  134:     Tracee = self(),
  135:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), true, [call]),
  136:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(Session, on_load, true, []),
  137:     dummy:module_info(),
  138:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  139:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  140:     ?line,
  141:     {Tracer, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  142:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), false, [call]),
  143:     dummy:module_info(),
  144:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  145:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  146:     ?line,
  147:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  148:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(Session, on_load, false, []),
  149:     ok.
  150: on_load2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  151:     Tracee = self(),
  152:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [call|Opts1]),
  153:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [call|Opts2]),
  154:     Opts1_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts1),
  155:     Opts2_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts2),
  156:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, true, Opts1_1),
  157:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, true, Opts2_1),
  158:     dummy:module_info(),
  159:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  160:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  161:     ?line,
  162:     receive_unsorted(
  163:         [{Tracer1,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}},
  164:          {Tracer2,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}}]),
  165:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call|Opts1]),
  166:     dummy:module_info(),
  167:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  168:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  169:     ?line,
  170:     {Tracer2, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  171:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call|Opts2]),
  172:     dummy:module_info(),
  173:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  174:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  175:     ?line,
  176:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  177: 
  178:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, false, Opts1_1),
  179:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, false, Opts2_1),
  180:     ok.
  181: 
  182: test_set_on_spawn(_Config) ->
  183:     Tester= self(),
  184:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  185:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  186:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  187:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  188:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  189:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  190: 
  191:     set_on_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  192:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  193:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  194:     set_on_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  195:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  196:     set_on_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  197:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  198: 
  199:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  200:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  201:     set_on_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  202:                   S1, Tracer1, []),
  203: 
  204:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  205:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  206:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  207: 
  208:     unlink(Tracer0),
  209:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  210:     unlink(Tracer1),
  211:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  212:     unlink(Tracer2),
  213:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  214:     ok.
  215: test_set_on_first_spawn(_Config) ->
  216:     Tester= self(),
  217:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  218:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  219:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  220:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  221:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  222:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  223: 
  224:     set_on_first_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  225:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  226:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  227:     set_on_first_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  228:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  229:     set_on_first_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  230:                         legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  231: 
  232:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  233:                         S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  234:     set_on_first_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  235:                         S1, Tracer1, []),
  236: 
  237:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  238:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  239:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  240: 
  241:     unlink(Tracer0),
  242:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  243:     unlink(Tracer1),
  244:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  245:     unlink(Tracer2),
  246:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  247:     ok.
  248: test_set_on_link(_Config) ->
  249:     Tester= self(),
  250:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  251:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  252:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  253:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  254:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  255:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  256: 
  257:     set_on_link(S1, Tracer1),
  258:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  259:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  260:     set_on_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  261:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  262:     set_on_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  263:                  legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  264: 
  265:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  266:                  S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  267:     set_on_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  268:                  S1, Tracer1, []),
  269:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  270:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  271:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  272: 
  273:     unlink(Tracer0),
  274:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  275:     unlink(Tracer1),
  276:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  277:     unlink(Tracer2),
  278:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  279:     ok.
  280: 
  281: test_set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  282:     Tester= self(),
  283:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  284:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  285:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  286:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  287:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  288:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  289: 
  290:     set_on_first_link(S1, Tracer1),
  291:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  292:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  293:     set_on_first_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  294:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  295:     set_on_first_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  296:                        legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  297: 
  298:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  299:                        S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  300:     set_on_first_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  301:                        S1, Tracer1, []),
  302:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  303:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  304:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  305: 
  306:     unlink(Tracer0),
  307:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  308:     unlink(Tracer1),
  309:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  310:     unlink(Tracer2),
  311:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  312:     ok.
  313: set_on_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  314:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  315:     Tracee = self(),
  316:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  317:                           receive hej ->
  318:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  319:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  320:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  321:                                   F()
  322:                           end
  323:                   end),
  324:     Child ! hej,
  325:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  326:     exit(Child, die),
  327:     receive_parallel(
  328:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  329: 
  330:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  331:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  332:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  333: 
  334:        [{Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child,'_'}},
  335:         {Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}]
  336:       }),
  337:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  338:     ok.
  339: 
  340: set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  341:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  342:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  343:     Tracee = self(),
  344:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  345:                           receive hej ->
  346:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  347:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  348:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  349:                                   F()
  350:                           end
  351:                   end),
  352:     Child ! hej,
  353:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  354:     exit(Child, die),
  355:     receive_parallel(
  356:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  357: 
  358:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  359: 
  360:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  361:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  362:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  363: 
  364:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  365:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  366:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  367: 
  368:        [{Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  369:         {Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}],
  370: 
  371:        [{Tracer2, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  372:         {Tracer2,{trace, '_', exit, die}}]
  373:       }),
  374: 
  375:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  376: 
  377:     Child1 = spawn(fun F() ->
  378:                            receive hej ->
  379:                                    Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  380:                                    exit(Pid, die),
  381:                                    Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  382:                                    F()
  383:                            end
  384:                    end),
  385:     Child1 ! hej,
  386:     receive {done, GrandChild1} -> ok end,
  387:     exit(Child1, die),
  388:     receive_parallel(
  389:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1,'_'}}],
  390: 
  391:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  392:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawn, GrandChild1, '_'}},
  393:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  394: 
  395:        [{Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, spawned, Child1,'_'}},
  396:         {Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, exit, die}}]
  397:       }),
  398: 
  399:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  400:     ok.
  401: 
  402: set_on_first_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  403:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  404:     Tracee = self(),
  405:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  406:                                 receive hej ->
  407:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  408:                                         Tracee ! spawned,
  409:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  410:                                         F()
  411:                                 end
  412:                         end),
  413:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  414:     receive spawned -> ok end,
  415:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  416:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  417:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  418:     receive_parallel(
  419:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  420:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  421: 
  422:        [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  423:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  424:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]}),
  425: 
  426:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  427:     ok.
  428: set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  429:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  430:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  431:     Tracee = self(),
  432:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  433:                                 receive hej ->
  434:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  435:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  436:                                         Tracee ! done,
  437:                                         F()
  438:                                 end
  439:                         end),
  440:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  441:     receive done -> ok end,
  442:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  443:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  444:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  445:     receive_parallel(
  446:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  447:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  448: 
  449:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  450:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  451: 
  452:        [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  453:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  454:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}],
  455: 
  456:        [{Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  457:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  458:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]
  459:       }),
  460: 
  461:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  462:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun F() ->
  463:                                  receive hej ->
  464:                                          Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  465:                                          exit(Pid, die),
  466:                                          F()
  467:                                  end
  468:                          end),
  469:     TraceeChild2 ! hej,
  470:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  471:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  472:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  473: 
  474:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  475:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  476:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  477:     ok.
  478: 
  479: set_on_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  480:     %% Test set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  481:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  482:     Tracee = self(),
  483:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  484:     unlink(Child),
  485:     exit(Child, die),
  486:     receive_parallel(
  487:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}},
  488:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  489:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  490: 
  491:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  492:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  493:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  494:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  495:       }),
  496: 
  497:     %% Test set_on_link via link/1
  498:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  499:     link(Child2),
  500:     unlink(Child2),
  501:     exit(Child2, die),
  502:     receive_parallel(
  503:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  504:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  505:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  506: 
  507:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  508:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  509:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  510:        }),
  511: 
  512:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer but still get traces
  513:     %% from child process
  514:     Child3 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  515:     link(Child3),
  516:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  517:     unlink(Child3),
  518:     exit(Child3, die),
  519:     receive_parallel(
  520:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child3,'_'}},
  521:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}}],
  522: 
  523:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  524:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  525:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  526:       }),
  527: 
  528:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer for the child process
  529:     %% and get messages from the parent
  530:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  531:     Child4 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  532:     link(Child4),
  533:     receive_parallel(
  534:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child4,'_'}},
  535:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child4}}],
  536: 
  537:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child4, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  538:       }),
  539:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, Child4, false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  540:     unlink(Child4),
  541:     exit(Child4, die),
  542:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child4}} = receive_any(),
  543: 
  544:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  545:     spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  546:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  547:     ok.
  548: set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  549:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  550:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  551:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  552:     Tracee = self(),
  553:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  554:     unlink(Child),
  555:     exit(Child, die),
  556: 
  557:     receive_parallel(
  558:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  559:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  560:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  561: 
  562:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  563:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  564:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  565: 
  566:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  567:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  568:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  569:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  570: 
  571:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  572:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  573:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  574:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  575:       }),
  576: 
  577:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via link/1
  578:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  579:     ?line,
  580:     link(Child1),
  581:     unlink(Child1),
  582:     exit(Child1, die),
  583: 
  584:     receive_parallel(
  585:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  586:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  587:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  588: 
  589:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  590:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  591:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  592: 
  593:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  594:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  595:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  596: 
  597:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  598:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  599:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}]
  600:       }),
  601: 
  602:     %% Disable one tracer and test that set_on_link still works for the other tracer
  603:     %% via spawn_link/1
  604:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  605:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  606:     unlink(Child2),
  607:     exit(Child2, die),
  608:     receive_parallel(
  609:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  610:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  611:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  612: 
  613:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child2, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  614:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  615:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  616:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  617:       }),
  618:     %% Test with link/1
  619:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  620:     link(Child21),
  621:     unlink(Child21),
  622:     exit(Child21, die),
  623:     receive_parallel(
  624:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  625:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  626:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  627: 
  628:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  629:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  630:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, exit, die}}]
  631:       }),
  632:     %% Test that you can disable one of the tracers on the child process
  633:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  634:     Child11 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  635:     link(Child11),
  636:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  637:     receive_parallel(
  638:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  639:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  640: 
  641:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  642:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  643: 
  644:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  645: 
  646:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  647:       }),
  648:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  649:     unlink(Child11),
  650:     exit(Child11, die),
  651:     receive_parallel(
  652:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  653: 
  654:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  655: 
  656:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  657:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child11, exit, die}}]
  658:       }),
  659: 
  660:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  661:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  662:     ok.
  663: 
  664: set_on_first_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  665:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  666:     Tracee = self(),
  667:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  668:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  669:     unlink(Child),
  670:     exit(Child, die),
  671:     unlink(Child1),
  672:     exit(Child1, die),
  673:     receive_parallel(
  674:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  675:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  676:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  677:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  678:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  679:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  680: 
  681:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  682:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  683:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  684:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  685:       }),
  686:     %% Test that spawn on first link works with link/1
  687:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  688:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  689:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  690:     link(Child2),
  691:     link(Child21),
  692:     unlink(Child2),
  693:     unlink(Child21),
  694:     exit(Child2, die),
  695:     exit(Child21,die),
  696:     receive_parallel(
  697:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  698:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  699:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  700:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  701:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}},
  702:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  703: 
  704:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  705:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  706:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  707:       }),
  708:     %% Test that spawn on first link flag is not on the child
  709:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  710:     Child3 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej ->
  711:                                       spawn_link(fun()-> receive M -> M end end),
  712:                                       Tracee ! done,
  713:                                       F()
  714:                               end
  715:                    end),
  716:     link(Child3),
  717:     Child3 ! hej,
  718:     receive done -> ok end,
  719:     unlink(Child3),
  720:     exit(Child3, die),
  721:     receive_parallel(
  722:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child3,'_'}},
  723:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}},
  724:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child3}}],
  725: 
  726:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  727:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, spawn,'_','_'}},
  728:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, link, '_'}},
  729:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  730:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  731:       }),
  732:     1 = erlang:trace(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  733:     ok.
  734: 
  735: set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  736:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  737:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  738:     Tracee = self(),
  739:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  740:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  741:     receive_parallel(
  742:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  743:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  744:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  745:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  746: 
  747:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  748:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  749:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  750:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  751: 
  752:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  753:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  754: 
  755:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  756:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  757:        }),
  758: 
  759:     unlink(Child),
  760:     exit(Child, die),
  761:     unlink(Child1),
  762:     exit(Child1, die),
  763:     receive_parallel(
  764:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  765:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  766: 
  767:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  768:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  769: 
  770:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  771:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  772: 
  773:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  774:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  775:       }),
  776: 
  777:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  778:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  779:     Child21 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  780:     unlink(Child2),
  781:     exit(Child2, die),
  782:     unlink(Child21),
  783:     exit(Child21, die),
  784:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,_}} = receive_any(),
  785:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  786:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,_}} = receive_any(),
  787:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  788:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  789:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  790:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  791:     ok.
  792: procs(_Config) ->
  793:     Tester= self(),
  794:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  795:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  796:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  797: 
  798:     procs_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  799: 
  800:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  801:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  802:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  803: 
  804:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  805:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  806:     procs_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  807:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  808:     procs_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  809:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  810: 
  811:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  812:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  813:     procs_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  814:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  815: 
  816:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  817:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  818:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  819: 
  820:     unlink(Tracer0),
  821:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  822:     unlink(Tracer1),
  823:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  824:     unlink(Tracer2),
  825:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  826:     ok.
  827: 
  828: procs_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  829:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  830: 
  831:     Tracee = self(),
  832:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  833:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  834:     unregister(RegName),
  835:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  836:     link(Child),
  837:     unlink(Child),
  838:     exit(Child, die),
  839:     receive_parallel(
  840:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  841:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  842:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  843:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  844:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  845: 
  846:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  847:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  848:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  849:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]}),
  850:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  851: 
  852:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  853:     unregister(RegName),
  854:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  855:     link(Child1),
  856:     unlink(Child1),
  857:     exit(Child1, die),
  858: 
  859:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  860: 
  861:     ok.
  862: procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  863:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  864:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  865: 
  866:     Tracee = self(),
  867:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  868:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  869:     unregister(RegName),
  870:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  871:     link(Child),
  872:     unlink(Child),
  873:     exit(Child, die),
  874:     receive_parallel(
  875:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  876:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  877:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  878:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  879:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  880: 
  881:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  882:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  883:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  884:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  885:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  886: 
  887:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  888:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  889:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  890:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}],
  891: 
  892:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  893:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  894:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  895:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]
  896:       }),
  897: 
  898:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  899:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  900:     unregister(RegName),
  901:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  902:     link(Child1),
  903:     unlink(Child1),
  904:     exit(Child1, die),
  905:     receive_parallel(
  906:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  907:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  908:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1, '_'}},
  909:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  910:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  911: 
  912:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  913:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  914:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  915:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, '_'}}]
  916:       }),
  917: 
  918:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  919:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  920:     unregister(RegName),
  921:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  922:     link(Child2),
  923:     unlink(Child2),
  924:     exit(Child2, die),
  925:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  926:     ok.
  927: 
  928: basic(_Config) ->
  929:     Tester = self(),
  930:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  931:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  932:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  933: 
  934:     basic_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  935: 
  936:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  937:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  938:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  939: 
  940:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  941:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  942:     basic_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  943:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  944:     basic_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  945:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  946: 
  947:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  948:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  949:     basic_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  950:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  951: 
  952:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  953:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  954:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  955: 
  956:     unlink(Tracer0),
  957:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  958:     unlink(Tracer1),
  959:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  960:     unlink(Tracer2),
  961:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  962: 
  963:     ok.
  964: 
  965: basic_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  966:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts]),
  967: 
  968:     Tracee = self(),
  969:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  970:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  971:     unregister(RegName),
  972: 
  973:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  974:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  975: 
  976:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts]),
  977: 
  978:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  979:     unregister(RegName),
  980: 
  981:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  982: 
  983:     ok.
  984: 
  985: basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  986:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs | Opts1]),
  987:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs | Opts2]),
  988: 
  989:     Tracee = self(),
  990:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  991:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  992:     unregister(RegName),
  993: 
  994:     receive_unsorted(
  995:       [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  996:        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}}]),
  997:     receive_unsorted(
  998:       [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  999:        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]),
 1000: 
 1001:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs | Opts1]),
 1002: 
 1003:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1004:     unregister(RegName),
 1005: 
 1006:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1007:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1008: 
 1009:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs | Opts2]),
 1010: 
 1011:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1012:     unregister(RegName),
 1013: 
 1014:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1015: 
 1016:     ok.
 1017: 
 1018: 
 1019: call(_Config) ->
 1020:     Tester = self(),
 1021:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1022:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1023:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
 1024: 
 1025:     call_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
 1026: 
 1027:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create(session0, undefined, []),
 1028:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1029:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1030: 
 1031:     [begin
 1032:          io:format("CallType = ~p\n", [CallType]),
 1033:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1034:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1035:          call_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1036:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1037:          call_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
 1038:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1039: 
 1040:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1041:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1042:          call_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1043:                   S1, Tracer1, [], CallType)
 1044:      end
 1045:      || CallType <- [
 1046:                      {[local], fun() -> foo() end},
 1047:                      {[global], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end},
 1048:                      {[local], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end}]
 1049:     ],
 1050: 
 1051:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
 1052:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
 1053:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
 1054: 
 1055:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1056:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1057:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1058:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1059:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1060:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1061: 
 1062:     ok.
 1063: 
 1064: call_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
 1065:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1066:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1067:     Tracee = self(),
 1068:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts]),
 1069:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, [local]),
 1070: 
 1071:     foo(),
 1072: 
 1073:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1074: 
 1075:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts]),
 1076: 
 1077:     foo(),
 1078:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1079: 
 1080:     ok.
 1081: 
 1082: call_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2, {TPopt, Call}) ->
 1083:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1084:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1085:     Tracee = self(),
 1086:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Tracee, true, [call | Opts1]),
 1087:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, Tracee, true, [call | Opts2]),
 1088: 
 1089:     ?line,
 1090:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1091:     Call(),
 1092:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1093:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1094: 
 1095:     ?line,
 1096:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1097:     Call(),
 1098:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1099:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1100:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1101: 
 1102:     ?line,
 1103:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1104:     Call(),
 1105:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1106:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1107: 
 1108:     ?line,
 1109:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1110:     Call(),
 1111:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1112:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1113:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1114: 
 1115:     ?line,
 1116:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1117:     Call(),
 1118:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1119:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1120: 
 1121:     ?line,
 1122:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1123:     Call(),
 1124:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1125:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1126:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1127: 
 1128:     ?line,
 1129:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call | Opts1]),
 1130:     Call(),
 1131:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1132:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1133: 
 1134:     ?line,
 1135:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1136:     Call(),
 1137:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1138: 
 1139:     ?line,
 1140:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1141:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call | Opts2]),
 1142:     Call(),
 1143:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1144: 
 1145:     ok.
 1146: 
 1147: meta(_Config) ->
 1148:     Tester = self(),
 1149:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1150: 
 1151:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1152:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1153:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity,true,[{meta,Tracer0}]),
 1154: 
 1155:     ?line,
 1156:     foo(),
 1157:     {Tracer0, {trace_ts,P,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1158: 
 1159:     ?line,
 1160:     ?MODULE:foo(),
 1161:     {Tracer0, {trace_ts,P,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1162: 
 1163:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity,false,[meta]),
 1164: 
 1165:     ?line,
 1166:     foo(),
 1167:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1168: 
 1169:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1170:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1171: 
 1172:     ok.
 1173: 
 1174: destroy(_Config) ->
 1175:     SName = ?MODULE,
 1176:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create(SName, self(), []),
 1177: 
 1178:     %% Destroy session with trace_session_destroy
 1179:     destroy_do(SName, fun() -> erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1) end),
 1180: 
 1181:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create(SName, self(), []),
 1182: 
 1183:     %% Destroy session with GC (magic bin destructor)
 1184:     put(session, S2),
 1185:     destroy_do(SName, fun() -> erase(session),
 1186:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
 1187:                                wait_bp_finish(),
 1188:                                ok
 1189:                       end),
 1190: 
 1191:     ok.
 1192: 
 1193: destroy_do(SName, Destroyer) ->
 1194:     Exp = {?MODULE, exported, 1},
 1195:     Loc = {?MODULE, local, 1},
 1196:     CallMS = [{[arg],[],[]}],
 1197:     SendMS = [{[self(), message],[],[]}],
 1198:     RecvMS = [{[node(), self(), message],[],[]}],
 1199:     [Port|_] = erlang:ports(),
 1200: 
 1201:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(SName, Exp, CallMS, [global]),
 1202:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(SName, Loc, CallMS, [local]),
 1203:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(SName, on_load, CallMS, [local]),
 1204:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(SName, send, SendMS, []),
 1205:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(SName, 'receive', RecvMS, []),
 1206:     0 = erlang:trace(SName, new_processes, true, [all]),
 1207:     0 = erlang:trace(SName, new_ports, true, [all]),
 1208:     1 = erlang:trace(SName, self(), true, [procs]),
 1209:     1 = erlang:trace(SName, Port, true, [ports]),
 1210: 
 1211:     [SName] = erlang:trace_session_info(Exp),
 1212:     [SName] = erlang:trace_session_info(Loc),
 1213:     [SName] = erlang:trace_session_info(on_load),
 1214:     SendSessions1 = erlang:trace_session_info(send),
 1215:     true = lists:member(SName, SendSessions1),
 1216:     RecvSessions1 = erlang:trace_session_info('receive'),
 1217:     true = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions1),
 1218:     [SName] = erlang:trace_session_info(new_processes),
 1219:     [SName] = erlang:trace_session_info(new_ports),
 1220:     [SName] = erlang:trace_session_info(self()),
 1221:     [SName] = erlang:trace_session_info(Port),
 1222: 
 1223:     {traced, global} = erlang:trace_info(SName, Exp, traced),
 1224:     {traced, local} = erlang:trace_info(SName, Loc, traced),
 1225:     {traced, local} = erlang:trace_info(SName, on_load, traced),
 1226:     {match_spec, SendMS} = erlang:trace_info(SName, send, match_spec),
 1227:     {match_spec, RecvMS} = erlang:trace_info(SName, 'receive', match_spec),
 1228:     {flags, [_|_]} = erlang:trace_info(SName, new_processes, flags),
 1229:     {flags, [_|_]} = erlang:trace_info(SName, new_ports, flags),
 1230:     {flags, [procs]} = erlang:trace_info(SName, self(), flags),
 1231:     {flags, [ports]} = erlang:trace_info(SName, Port, flags),
 1232: 
 1233:     Destroyer(),
 1234: 
 1235:     [] = erlang:trace_session_info(Exp),
 1236:     [] = erlang:trace_session_info(Loc),
 1237:     [] = erlang:trace_session_info(on_load),
 1238:     SendSessions2 = erlang:trace_session_info(send),
 1239:     false = lists:member(SName, SendSessions2),
 1240:     RecvSessions2 = erlang:trace_session_info('receive'),
 1241:     false = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions2),
 1242:     [] = erlang:trace_session_info(new_processes),
 1243:     [] = erlang:trace_session_info(new_ports),
 1244:     [] = erlang:trace_session_info(self()),
 1245:     [] = erlang:trace_session_info(Port),
 1246: 
 1247:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, Exp, traced)),
 1248:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, Loc, traced)),
 1249:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, on_load, traced)),
 1250:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, send, match_spec)),
 1251:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, 'receive', match_spec)),
 1252:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, new_processes, flags)),
 1253:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, new_ports, flags)),
 1254:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, self(), flags)),
 1255:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:trace_info(SName, Port, flags)),
 1256:     true.
 1257: 
 1258: wait_bp_finish() ->
 1259:     wait_thread_progress(5).
 1260: 
 1261: wait_thread_progress(0) -> ok;
 1262: wait_thread_progress(N) ->
 1263:     ok = erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, thread_progress),
 1264:     wait_thread_progress(N-1).
 1265: 
 1266: foo() ->
 1267:     ok.
 1268: 
 1269: exported(X) ->
 1270:     local(X).
 1271: 
 1272: local(_) ->
 1273:     ok.
 1274: 
 1275: tracer(Name, Tester) ->
 1276:     receive M ->
 1277:             io:format("~p ~p got message: ~p\n", [Name, self(), M]),
 1278:             Tester ! {self(), M}
 1279:     end,
 1280:     tracer(Name, Tester).
 1281: 
 1282: 
 1283: receive_any() ->
 1284:     receive_any(1000).
 1285: 
 1286: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1287:     receive M -> M
 1288:     after Timeout -> timeout
 1289:     end.
 1290: 
 1291: receive_nothing() ->
 1292:     receive_any(10).
 1293: 
 1294: %% Argument is a tuple of lists with expected messages to receive.
 1295: %% Each list is internally ordered according to expected reception.
 1296: %% The different lists in the tuple are mutually unordered.
 1297: %% '_' can be used as wildcard in message terms.
 1298: receive_parallel({}) ->
 1299:     ok;
 1300: receive_parallel(Tuple) ->
 1301:     M = receive_any(),
 1302:     receive_parallel(M, Tuple, tuple_size(Tuple)).
 1303: 
 1304: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I) when I > 0 ->
 1305:     [Pattern|Tail] = element(I, Tuple),
 1306:     case {match(Pattern, M), Tail} of
 1307:         {true, []} ->
 1308:             receive_parallel(erlang:delete_element(I, Tuple));
 1309:         {true, _} ->
 1310:             receive_parallel(setelement(I, Tuple, Tail));
 1311:         {false, _} ->
 1312:             receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I-1)
 1313:     end;
 1314: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, 0) ->
 1315:     Failed = [H || [H|_] <- tuple_to_list(Tuple)],
 1316:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1317:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1318:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1319: 
 1320: 
 1321: receive_unsorted(Expect) ->
 1322:     receive_unsorted(Expect, length(Expect)).
 1323: 
 1324: receive_unsorted(Expect0, Cnt) when Cnt > 0 ->
 1325:     M = receive_any(),
 1326:     Expect1 = match_and_delete(M, Expect0, []),
 1327:     receive_unsorted(Expect1, Cnt-1);
 1328: receive_unsorted(_, 0) ->
 1329:     ok.
 1330: 
 1331: match_and_delete(M, [Pattern | Tail], Failed) ->
 1332:     case match(Pattern, M) of
 1333:         true -> Failed ++ Tail;
 1334:         false ->
 1335:             match_and_delete(M, Tail, [Pattern | Failed])
 1336:     end;
 1337: match_and_delete(M, [], Failed) ->
 1338:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1339:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1340:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1341: 
 1342: 
 1343: 
 1344: match(A, A) -> true;
 1345: match('_', _) -> true;
 1346: match([Ah|At], [Bh|Bt]) ->
 1347:     match(Ah, Bh) andalso match(At, Bt);
 1348: match(A, B) when tuple_size(A) =:= tuple_size(B) ->
 1349:     match(tuple_to_list(A), tuple_to_list(B));
 1350: match(_A, _B) ->
 1351:     false.
 1352: 
 1353: 
 1354: end_of_list(_Config) ->
 1355:     ok.
